qas.question: What is the name of the individuals who gave relevant information on the recent events in Burma ?
Have there been any advances in the human rights situation in Myanmar?

answers.text: the country's human rights record has been improving

qas.question: What is the current rating of for Burma from the  Freedom in the World report and what caused the current standing ?

answers.text: Myanmar improved yet again, receiving a score of five in civil liberties and a six in political freedom

qas.question: What was the previous rating for Burma?
What caused Myanmar to receive a rating of 6?

answers.text: improvements in civil liberties and political rights, the release of political prisoners, and a loosening of restrictions.

context: According to <a0_0>the Crisis Group<a0_0/>, since Myanmar transitioned to a new government in August 2011, <a1_0>the country's human rights record has been improving<a1_0/>. Previously giving Myanmar its <a3_0>lowest rating of 7<a3_0/>, the 2012 Freedom in the World report also notes improvement, giving Myanmar a 6 for <a4_0>improvements in civil liberties and political rights, the release of political prisoners, and a loosening of restrictions.<a4_0/> In 2013, <a2_0>Myanmar improved yet again, receiving a score of five in civil liberties and a six in political freedom<a2_0/>s
